attributes.additional_details:
Everybody's safely is Paramount and we must re-open the night tube at a minimum on Friday and Saturdays when the most footfall is around.

I would like the night tube to be introduced across all days as people go out more then just on Fridays and the weekend. 


keep people safe, let people live there lives , increasing the economy
attributes.background: With everything now being in full swing of being reopened, the economy is slowly growing and the streets and dance floors and pubs are starting to see a full flow of people come though there doors.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about London Underground operational hours are a matter for TfL, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
